summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 12.0°C) and outside temperature (down 11.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11729 lux) and cloud levels (up 371 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16017 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 256 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 370.8m lower than yesterday, 247.2m lower than past week, 255.6m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 425m minimum and 1526m maximum, with an average of 582.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 829.4m and 837.8m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, dry and less humid conditions and mostly calm with light air movement. A few light raindrops may fall, overcast skies with low cloud, and light levels will be low during the day. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
